attributes.action: Hold a public vote of no confidence in the NI executive.
attributes.additional_details: The people of Northern Ireland have put up with the stormount executive for too long. They are a failure on our society and our progess going forwards in the future.
attributes.background: The people of Northern Ireland deserve to determine if they have lost confidence in the mps running our country and how the goverment in NI keeps failing. Stormount is not fit for purpose and is a constant embarrassment to the people of NI.

rejection.details: The decision to call for a vote of no confidence in the Northern Ireland Executive is a matter for the political parties in the Assembly and for individual MLAs, not the UK Government or Parliament.
